News.Title: Canara HSBC Life Reports Strong Q3 FY26 Growth
News.Summary: Canara HSBC Life Insurance delivered robust 9M FY26 results with Individual WPI of ₹1,915.30 crore (20.50% YoY growth), VNB of ₹412.90 crore (36.80% growth), and protection business surging 126% year-on-year.

News.Title: Canara HSBC Life Plans ₹250 Cr NCD Issue
News.Summary: Canara HSBC Life Insurance Company announces plans to raise ₹250.00 crores through non-convertible debentures to strengthen its capital base and support business expansion.

News.Title: Canara HSBC Life Authorizes KMPs for Material Disclosures
News.Summary: Canara HSBC Life Insurance has authorized three Key Managerial Personnel to determine materiality of events and make disclosures to stock exchanges under SEBI regulations.

News.Title: Motilal Oswal Initiates Buy on Canara HSBC Life
News.Summary: Motilal Oswal initiates coverage on Canara HSBC Life Insurance with a Buy rating and target price of ₹180.00, citing strong growth trajectory and market share gains in the life insurance sector.

News.Title: Motilal Oswal sees 51% upside in Canara HSBC Life
News.Summary: Brokerage initiates coverage with ₹180 price target and ₹220 bull case target by FY28. Company shows strong growth with 22% APE CAGR and expanding market share despite low penetration among Canara Bank customers.

News.Title: Motilal Oswal Initiates Buy Rating on Canara HSBC Life
News.Summary: Motilal Oswal has initiated coverage on Canara HSBC Life Insurance with a 'Buy' rating, citing multi-year growth opportunities from improving bancassurance and HSBC partnerships.

News.Title: Canara HSBC Life Insurance Partners With Equitas SFB
News.Summary: Canara HSBC Life Insurance Company has entered into a partnership agreement with Equitas Small Finance Bank. The agreement was signed on November 25, 2025.

News.Title: Canara HSBC Life clarifies Equitas SFB partnership
News.Summary: Canara HSBC Life Insurance provides clarification on its distribution agreement with Equitas Small Finance Bank, stating the partnership falls below materiality thresholds for stock exchange reporting.

News.Title: Investec Initiates 'Buy' on Canara HSBC Life at ₹225
News.Summary: Investec Securities has initiated coverage on Canara HSBC Life Insurance Company with a 'Buy' rating and set a price target of ₹225 per share for the mid-cap insurance stock.

News.Title: Canara HSBC Life Insurance Faces ₹3.46 Cr GST Demand
News.Summary: Canara HSBC Life Insurance Company received a GST demand order of ₹3.46 crores from UP authorities for FY 2021-22, covering tax, interest, and penalties. The company plans to appeal the order.
